description: For [Operation Dream Job](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0022), [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) compromised domains in Italy and other countries for their C2 infrastructure.(Citation: McAfee Lazarus Jul 2020)(Citation: McAfee Lazarus Nov 2020)
